glacier_restore_timeout.description: Keep restored assets online for this many days to allow them to be copied before going back to Glacier

object_ids.description: The number of object_ids in the list is limited to a minimum of 0 and a maximum of 500

format_metadata.description: Sequence cannot have more than 10000. Excess values will be stripped

use_symlink.description: If enabled a soft link is used to add original to the watch folder, if disabled a hard link is used with a fallback to copy.

use_unique_sub_folder_workflow.description: A sub-folder is created with a unique name inside the watch folder per job.
